title: NFL Aims To Spice Up Games With Tweak To Extra Point Rules
teaser: An NFL rule change has been called "the biggest change to NFL scoring in the league's 95 year history." NPR's Rachel Martin talks to Mike Pesca, of Slate's "The Gist" podcast, about what it means for the game.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
